result.title: [I'm a newbie] Need help with a undirected graph!
result.content: Hi, i'm have problems whit find cicle in D. Subway problem. I have to find a cicle. Initially I thought that by implementing tarjan algorithm I could find the cycle (I tried it and I can't imagine it in an unmanaged graph), but maybe it would be easier to go through it with bfs and store the nodes that I am visiting in a set if they are not in the set . If it means that the nodes of the set are the cycle that I am looking for. Is this correct?. Is there a more efficient way and how can I implement it? Thank you
